detectors.description:
RetroactiveMerkleDistributorPhaseOne.isClaimed(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RetroactiveMerkleDistributorPhaseOne.sol#134-140) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- claimedWordIndex = index / 256 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RetroactiveMerkleDistributorPhaseOne.sol#135)
	- claimedBitIndex = index % 256 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RetroactiveMerkleDistributorPhaseOne.sol#136)
	- mask = (1 << claimedBitIndex) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RetroactiveMerkleDistributorPhaseOne.sol#138)
	- claimedWord & mask == mask (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RetroactiveMerkleDistributorPhaseOne.sol#139)
